intro.p: The GStreamer team is pleased to announce the second release of the unstable 1.9 release series, which marks the feature freeze for 1.10. The 1.9 release series is adding new features on top of the 1.0, 1.2, 1.4, 1.6 and 1.8 series and is part of the API and ABI-stable 1.x release series of the GStreamer multimedia framework. The unstable 1.9 release series will lead to the stable 1.10 release series in the next weeks. Any newly added API can still change until that point.
Binaries for Android, iOS, Mac OS X and Windows will be provided in the next days.

No perfectly groomed moustache or any amount of fine clothing is going to cover up the truth - these plugins are Bad with a capital B. They look fine on the outside, and might even appear to get the job done, but at the end of the day they're a black sheep. Without a golden-haired angel to watch over them, they'll probably land in an unmarked grave at the final showdown.

Don't bug us about their quality - exercise your Free Software rights, patch up the offender and send us the patch on the fastest steed you can steal from the Confederates. Because you see, in this world, there's two kinds of people, my friend: those with loaded guns and those who dig. You dig.

This module contains a set of plugins that aren't up to par compared to the rest. They might be close to being good quality, but they're missing something - be it a good code review, some documentation, a set of tests, a real live maintainer, or some actual wide use. If the blanks are filled in they might be upgraded to become part of either gst-plugins-good or gst-plugins-ugly, depending on the other factors. If the plugins break, you can't complain - instead, you can fix the problem and send us a patch, or bribe someone into fixing them for you. New contributors can start here for things to work on.

Other modules containing plugins are:
gst-plugins-base contains a basic set of well-supported plugins gst-plugins-good contains a set of well-supported plugins under our preferred license gst-plugins-ugly contains a set of well-supported plugins, but might pose problems for distributors gst-libav contains a set of codecs plugins based on libav (formerly gst-ffmpeg)

bug.summary: h264parse wrongly insert DISCONT flags when converting into AVC
dashdemux: add support for I frame based trick play
Dashdemux: returned seekable range for live streams is not usable
player: Add way to override HTTP (+RTSP, etc) user agent
rawparse: new rawaudioparse and rawvideoparse element which deprecate audioparse, unalignedaudioparse, and videoparse
adaptivedemux: avoid possible deadlock while destroying old sources
Deadlock in WebKit when deleting the media player while HLS media was loaded
qtplugins: How to implement qmlglsrc.
Configure check for OpenGL is wrong on OS X.
lv2: Does not build with lilv 0.20
EGL_DMA_Buf: Wrong attribute list type for EGL 1.5
Mac OS X build warnings: -Werror gstjpeg2000parse.c
openh264: Fail to build with openh264 1.6.0
camerabinpreview: fix bus leak
bad: fix leaks in tests
player: move 'position-update-interval' setting to the config struct
fix simple-launch-lines test with no jpeg lib
GLMemory created by avfvideosrc and vtdec on iOS (EAGL/gles3) can't be mapped
Broken compilation on RPi with latest rawaudioparse changes
glimagesink: Horizontal/vertical flip matrizes are swapped
aiffparse: Add bitrate and container format tags
glcolorconvert: _get_n_textures: code should not be reached
dashdemux: Fix sidx snap/keyframe seeks
hls, timecode: can't build debian package from git master, need to fix linking
rawparse: Unit test fixes and additions
x265enc enable aspect ratio
videoparse: format i420, invalid buffer size (regression)
gl: hang on joining thread
avfvideosrc: account for retina displays when capturing screens
vtdec: missing systemstream=false in mpeg decoder caps
adaptivedemux: fix stream exposure condition
daala: typo related compilation error
decklinkvideosink: " Failed to schedule frame " and Decklink Duo 2
gst-plugins-bad tarball lacks opensles.h
dashdemux: Add properties to select maximum allowed width/height and framerate
Build failure: fatal error: gst/gl/gstglconfig.h: No such file or directory
qtkitvideosrc: 'QTKit/QTKit.h' file not found (macOS Sierra)
Build failure with -O3 in Ubuntu 16.04
Fail to decode media on OSX because it's not supported by vtdec_hw but vtdec can play it
